General_Description: '''Clothes Make the Daughter''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Rejected by the [[Daughters of Artemis]], a young woman asked Kassandra to aid her in disguising herself as one of them.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra reached the northeastern shore of [[Chios]] and found a young woman had set up camp and was sulking.
*'''Civilian:''' Maláka''... What will I do now?''
Kassandra approached the girl.
<tabber>
|-|If Kassandra had not collected the armor=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What's wrong?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''I've dedicated my life to becoming a Daughter of Artemis, but they said I'm not tough enough to join them.''
{{#tag:tabber|
You don't need them.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Following others is a sign of weakness.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''But I've followed [[Artemis]] for so long...''
{{!}}-{{!}}
We all want to fit in.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's human nature to want to fit in.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Being part of something is all I've ever wanted. Now I'm just a feather on the wind.''
}}
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your life is your own. If you've lost your purpose, find another one.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''A new life purpose? I wouldn't even know where to begin.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''No! I'm not giving up that easily. I have an idea.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''I'll join them anyway! I'll infiltrate their village and live among them. Can you help me? I'll pay you all the [[drachma]]e I have.''
(Accept – "I'll help you.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.''
Despite this, Kassandra warned her of the risk.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Daughters of Artemis are dangerous, and if you're found out...''
*'''Civilian:''' ''I accept the risks. What I'll need you to do is get me a piece of their [[armor]], headgear, and [[boot]]s.''
(If "Where are the boots?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where can I find the boots?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''There's a [[Artemis Cave|cave]] in the cliffs on the western side of the Daughters' village where they train new recruits. They tested me there, but I left my boots behind when they kicked me out.''
(If "Where can I find the armor?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Any idea where I can find the armor you need?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''There's a small [[Huntress Outpost Camp|outpost camp]] just south of the Daughters' village. You'll find extra armor there. They barely defend it—''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Easy.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''—Which is why it was recently overrun with beasts even they can't tame.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ah.''
(If "Where is the headgear?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me where to find the headgear.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''You'll find it around the hut of the Daughters' most favored huntress, near the center of their village.''
(Leave – "That's all I need to know.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I have the gear.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Thank you, ''misthios''. You'll have to be stealthy to get the items, and please avoid harming any of the Daughters if you can.''
The young woman returned to her seat and Kassandra set off for the [[Huntress Village]].
[[File:ACOD Clothes Make the Daughter 2.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra arriving at the Daughters of Artemis camp ]]
From the outskirts of the village, [[Ikaros]] identified the hut where the headgear could be found.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That must be the hut of the favorite daughter.''
Ikaros then found the cave containing the boots.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That must be the cave where the boots are.''
Kassandra made her way to the hut. She pondered the condition of the village compared to the other Artemis camps.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's something different about this village.''
[[File:ACOD Clothes Make the Daughter 3.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra recovering the boots from the chest]]
Kassandra claimed the headgear from a [[Treasure chest|chest]] near the central hut. She made her way to the western cave and found the boots in a different chest. Kassandra crept out of the village and made her way southwest to the outpost camp, where Ikaros identified the chest containing the armor.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The outpost camp.''
[[File:ACOD Clothes Make the Daughter 4.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra arriving at the huntress camp]]
Kassandra slew the wolves that had overrun the camp and claimed the armor. With all three items in hand, she made her way back to the young woman.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've got the gear you asked for, but remember—the Daughters of Artemis are legendary warriors. If you choose to infiltrate them, it's likely you'll be killed.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''What choice do I have?''
|-|If Kassandra had already collected the armor=
*'''Civilian:''' Misthios''. I need a piece of armor, headgear, and boots from the [[Daughters of Artemis]]. Can you help?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Are these what you're looking for? They don't quite fit me.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Thank you, ''misthios''! I'll finally be able to infiltrate the Daughters of Artemis and join my sisters.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You might want to reconsider. The Daughters of Artemis won't respond well to an intruder.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''What would you do?''
</tabber>
<tabber>
|-|Choose life.=
[[File:ACOD Clothes Make the Daughter 5.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra encouraging the woman to give up joining the group]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Find a new path that lets you really live.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''You're just like them. Thinking I'm not tough enough.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Taking a life isn't easy, and it can't be undone. You aren't a killer.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''You don't know me. I can do it!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I can see good in you. You're passionate, determined—why not help others?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Really? You think ''I'' could do that?''
The young woman decided what to do.
*'''Civilian:''' ''I know... I'll become a priestess—and join a temple! Thank you, ''misthios''!''
Kassandra met up with her later.
*'''Civilian:''' ''Misthios! Remember me? You convinced me not to infiltrate the Daughters of Artemis. You saved my life, though—I don't yet know what to do with it.''
|-|Risk almost certain death.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's a high price to pay for chasing what we want - maybe even death. You must be willing to pay it.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''Yes. This is something I must do.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra handed the equipment to the woman, and either supported her plan or convinced her to follow another path.
Section_Behind_the_scenes:
The name of the memory is a play on the idiom "clothes make the man."

The quest can overlap with "[[Hard to Artemis]]", in that the [[Artemis Cave]] is one of the targets for both quests.  If Ikaros highlights the cave while both quests are active, then both of Kassandra's comments tied to each highlight will play simultaneously.

Ironically, if players had already completed the memory "[[Artemis's Request]]", in which Kassandra joins the Daughters of Artemis as their new leader despite being an outsider herself as she had warned the civilian, there is no effect on the dialogue in this quest.
